mapper.sql: id, code, code_name, result_type, result_type_name, new_price, amplitude, amplitude_price, turnover, total_market_value, circulation_value, real_value, bodies_num, first_partner, stock_ratio, day5, day10, day20, create_date
mapper.insert: insert into t_stock_result (id, code, code_name, result_type, result_type_name, new_price, amplitude, amplitude_price, turnover, total_market_value, circulation_value, real_value, bodies_num, first_partner, stock_ratio, day5, day10, day20, create_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{resultTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amplitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amplitudePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{turnover,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalMarketValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{circulationValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bodiesNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstPartner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{day5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{day10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{day20,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_stock_result
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code_name = #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result_type = #{resultType,jdbcType=CHAR},
result_type_name = #{resultTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_price = #{newPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amplitude = #{amplitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amplitude_price = #{amplitudePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
turnover = #{turnover,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_market_value = #{totalMarketValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
circulation_value = #{circulationValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
real_value = #{realValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bodies_num = #{bodiesNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
first_partner = #{firstPartner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stock_ratio = #{stockRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
day5 = #{day5,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
day10 = #{day10,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
day20 = #{day20,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update t_stock_result set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_name = #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_type = #{resultType,jdbcType=CHAR}, result_type_name = #{resultTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_price = #{newPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amplitude = #{amplitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amplitude_price = #{amplitudePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, turnover = #{turnover,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_market_value = #{totalMarketValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, circulation_value = #{circulationValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, real_value = #{realValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bodies_num = #{bodiesNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_partner = #{firstPartner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_ratio = #{stockRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, day5 = #{day5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, day10 = #{day10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, day20 = #{day20,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_stock_result ( id, CODE, code_name, result_type, result_type_name, new_price, amplitude, amplitude_price, turnover, total_market_value, circulation_value, real_value, bodies_num, first_partner, stock_ratio, day5, day10, day20, create_date ) ( SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), today.code, today.code_name, '01', '反包', today.new_price, today.amplitude, today.amplitude_price, expand.turnover, expand.total_market_value, expand.circulation_value, expand.real_value, expand.bodies_num, expand.first_partner, expand.stock_ratio, ma.day5, ma.day10, ma.day20, today.create_date FROM t_stock yestoday, t_stock today, t_stock_expand expand, t_stock_ma ma WHERE yestoday.`create_date` = (select create_date from t_stock t where t.code='sh601988' AND t.create_date < #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by t.create_date desc limit 1) AND today.`create_date` = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND expand.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ma.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND yestoday.`code` = today.`code` AND today.`code`=expand.`code` AND today.`code`=ma.`code` AND yestoday.`new_price` < yestoday.`today_open` AND today.`today_open` <= yestoday.`low_price` AND today.`new_price` >= yestoday.`height_price` AND today.`deal_vol` > yestoday.`deal_vol` AND today.`amplitude` > '0.03' AND today.`new_price` > ma.`day20` AND yestoday.`new_price` > ma.`day20` )

INSERT INTO t_stock_result ( id, CODE, code_name, result_type, result_type_name, new_price, amplitude, amplitude_price, turnover, total_market_value, circulation_value, real_value, bodies_num, first_partner, stock_ratio, day5, day10, day20, create_date ) ( SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), today.code, today.code_name, '02', '阶段底-防御', today.new_price, today.amplitude, today.amplitude_price, expand.turnover, expand.total_market_value, expand.circulation_value, expand.real_value, expand.bodies_num, expand.first_partner, expand.stock_ratio, ma.day5, ma.day10, ma.day20, today.create_date FROM t_stock yestoday, t_stock today, t_stock_expand expand, t_stock_ma ma WHERE yestoday.`create_date` = (SELECT create_date FROM t_stock t WHERE t.code='sh601988' AND t.create_date < #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY t.create_date DESC LIMIT 1) AND today.`create_date` = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND expand.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ma.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND yestoday.`code` = today.`code` AND today.`code`=expand.`code` AND today.`code`=ma.`code` AND yestoday.`new_price` < yestoday.`today_open` AND today.`new_price` >= today.`today_open` AND today.`low_price` >= yestoday.`new_price` AND today.`height_price` <= yestoday.`today_open` AND today.`deal_vol` > (yestoday.`deal_vol` * 0.7) AND today.`deal_vol` < yestoday.`deal_vol` AND today.`new_price` <= ma.`day5` )

INSERT INTO t_stock_result ( id, CODE, code_name, result_type, result_type_name, new_price, amplitude, amplitude_price, turnover, total_market_value, circulation_value, real_value, bodies_num, first_partner, stock_ratio, day5, day10, day20, create_date ) ( SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), today.code, today.code_name, '03', '阶段底-进攻', today.new_price, today.amplitude, today.amplitude_price, expand.turnover, expand.total_market_value, expand.circulation_value, expand.real_value, expand.bodies_num, expand.first_partner, expand.stock_ratio, ma.day5, ma.day10, ma.day20, today.create_date FROM t_stock yestoday, t_stock today, t_stock_expand expand, t_stock_ma ma WHERE yestoday.`create_date` = (SELECT create_date FROM t_stock t WHERE t.code='sh601988' AND t.create_date < #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY t.create_date DESC LIMIT 1) AND today.`create_date` = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND expand.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ma.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND yestoday.`code` = today.`code` AND today.`code`=expand.`code` AND today.`code`=ma.`code` AND yestoday.`new_price` < yestoday.`today_open` AND today.`new_price` > today.`today_open` AND today.`low_price` >= yestoday.`new_price` AND today.`new_price` >= yestoday.`today_open` AND today.`deal_vol` > yestoday.`deal_vol` AND today.`deal_vol` <= (yestoday.`deal_vol` * 1.3) AND (today.`new_price`-today.`today_open`) > (today.`height_price`-today.`new_price`) )

INSERT INTO t_stock_result ( id, CODE, code_name, result_type, result_type_name, new_price, amplitude, amplitude_price, turnover, total_market_value, circulation_value, real_value, bodies_num, first_partner, stock_ratio, day5, day10, day20, create_date ) ( SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), today.code, today.code_name, '04', '空中加油', today.new_price, today.amplitude, today.amplitude_price, expand.turnover, expand.total_market_value, expand.circulation_value, expand.real_value, expand.bodies_num, expand.first_partner, expand.stock_ratio, ma.day5, ma.day10, ma.day20, today.create_date FROM t_stock yestoday, t_stock today, t_stock_expand expand, t_stock_ma ma WHERE yestoday.`create_date` = (SELECT create_date FROM t_stock t WHERE t.code='sh601988' AND t.create_date < #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY t.create_date DESC LIMIT 1) AND today.`create_date` = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND expand.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ma.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND yestoday.`code` = today.`code` AND today.`code`=expand.`code` AND today.`code`=ma.`code` AND yestoday.`today_open` < yestoday.`new_price` AND yestoday.`amplitude` > '0.05' AND today.`today_open` > yestoday.`new_price` AND today.`new_price` > yestoday.`new_price` AND today.`new_price`-today.`today_open` BETWEEN -0.05 AND 0.05 AND (today.`height_price`-today.`new_price`) >= (today.`today_open`-today.`low_price`) AND today.`low_price` > (yestoday.`new_price` * 0.8) AND today.`deal_vol` < yestoday.`deal_vol` AND today.`deal_vol` > (yestoday.`deal_vol` * 0.7) AND today.`new_price` > ma.`day5` )

INSERT INTO t_stock_result ( id, CODE, code_name, result_type, result_type_name, new_price, amplitude, amplitude_price, turnover, total_market_value, circulation_value, real_value, bodies_num, first_partner, stock_ratio, day5, day10, day20, create_date ) ( SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), today.code, today.code_name, '05', '风口神龙', today.new_price, today.amplitude, today.amplitude_price, expand.turnover, expand.total_market_value, expand.circulation_value, expand.real_value, expand.bodies_num, expand.first_partner, expand.stock_ratio, ma.day5, ma.day10, ma.day20, today.create_date FROM t_stock bf1, t_stock bf2, t_stock bf3, t_stock yestoday, t_stock today, t_stock_expand expand, t_stock_ma ma WHERE today.`create_date` = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND yestoday.`create_date` = (SELECT create_date FROM t_stock t WHERE t.code='sh601988' AND t.create_date < today.`create_date` ORDER BY t.create_date DESC LIMIT 1) AND bf3.`create_date` = (SELECT create_date FROM t_stock t WHERE t.code='sh601988' AND t.create_date < yestoday.`create_date` ORDER BY t.create_date DESC LIMIT 1) AND bf2.`create_date` = (SELECT create_date FROM t_stock t WHERE t.code='sh601988' AND t.create_date < bf3.`create_date` ORDER BY t.create_date DESC LIMIT 1) AND bf1.`create_date` = (SELECT create_date FROM t_stock t WHERE t.code='sh601988' AND t.create_date < bf2.`create_date` ORDER BY t.create_date DESC LIMIT 1) AND expand.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ma.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND today.`code` = yestoday.`code` AND today.`code`=bf3.`code` AND today.`code`=bf2.`code` AND today.`code`=bf1.`code` AND today.`code`=expand.`code` AND today.`code`=ma.`code` AND (bf1.`amplitude` >= '0.095' OR (bf2.`today_open` > bf1.`new_price` AND bf2.`new_price` > bf1.`new_price` AND bf1.`new_price` > bf1.`today_open` AND bf2.`amplitude` > '0.03')) AND bf2.`low_price` > bf1.`new_price` AND bf3.`low_price` > bf1.`new_price` AND yestoday.`low_price` > bf1.`new_price` AND today.`low_price` > bf1.`new_price` AND today.`amplitude` > '-0.07' )
